remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來填入之前加入的資料列的資料格控制項。Use this method to populate a with cells before you add the row to a control. 一旦您加入資料列至控制項時，它一律包含的資料格數目會符合在控制項中，資料行數目，所以這個方法不會再很有用。Once you add the row to a control, the number of cells it contains always matches the number of columns in the control, so this method is no longer useful.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridViewCellCollection1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridViewCellCollection1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦您加入資料列至控制項時，它一律包含的資料格數目會符合在控制項中，資料行數目，所以這個方法不會再很有用。Once you add the row to a control, the number of cells it contains always matches the number of columns in the control, so this method is no longer useful. 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
